text: The antioxidant activity of essential oils is another biological property of great interest because they may preserve foods from the toxic effects of oxidants [ 15 ] . Moreover , essential oils being also able of scavenging free radicals may play an important role in some disease prevention such as brain dysfunction , cancer , heart disease and immune system decline . Increasing evidence has suggested that these diseases may result from cellular damage caused by free radicals [ 16 , 17 ] .
